entry.title: Taramira Oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nutria Fresh
Type:
Price: 783.00

Taramira oil, also known as arugula oil or Jamba oil, is a natural oil that is extracted from the seeds of the taramira plant (Eruca sativa). It is a yellow to golden-colored oil with a slightly pungent odor. Taramira oil has been used for centuries in traditional medicine for a variety of ailments. 

Quick Facts:

Taramira oil has several potential health benefits, including:

  • Improved hair health: Taramira oil is a good source of essential fatty acids, which are important for hair growth. Taramira oil can also help to nourish the scalp and reduce dandruff.
  • Reduced inflammation: Taramira oil has anti-inflammatory properties that can help to reduce inflammation throughout the body. Inflammation is linked to several chronic diseases, such as heart disease, cancer, and Alzheimer's disease.
  • Improved skin health: Taramira oil is a good source of vitamins and antioxidants, which can help to protect the skin from damage. Taramira oil can also help to moisturize the skin and reduce wrinkles.
  • Boosted immune system: Taramira oil is a good source of antioxidants, which can help to boost the immune system. Antioxidants can help to protect the body from damage caused by free radicals.
  • Reduced pain: Taramira oil has analgesic properties that can help to reduce pain. Taramira oil can be applied topically to the affected area to help relieve pain.

How to Use

Taramira oil can be used in a variety of ways. It can be applied topically to the skin or hair, or it can be taken orally.

  • For hair health: Massage taramira oil into your scalp and hair. Leave it on for 30 minutes to an hour before washing it off.
  • For skin health: Apply taramira oil to the affected area. Massage it in gently.
  • For pain relief: Apply taramira oil to the affected area. Massage it in gently.
  • For oral consumption: Take 1-2 teaspoons of taramira oil per day.

entry.title: Sweet Almond Oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nutria Fresh
Type:
Price: 1539.00

Sweet almond oil is a pale yellow, almost colorless, carrier oil that is derived from the kernels of sweet almonds. It is a popular choice for skin care and massage, as it is gentle and non-irritating. Sweet almond oil is also a good source of vitamin E, which is an antioxidant that can help protect the skin from damage. 


Quick Facts:

Sweet almond oil has several potential benefits for the skin, including:

  • Moisturizing: Sweet almond oil is a natural emollient, which means that it helps to keep the skin hydrated. It is a good choice for people with dry or sensitive skin.
  • Soothing: Sweet almond oil can help to soothe irritated skin. It is a good choice for people with conditions such as eczema or psoriasis.
  • Anti-inflammatory: Sweet almond oil has anti-inflammatory properties that can help to reduce redness and swelling.
  • Antioxidant: Sweet almond oil is a good source of vitamin E, which is an antioxidant that can help to protect the skin from damage caused by free radicals.
  • Anti-aging: Sweet almond oil can help to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines.

How to Use

Sweet almond oil can be used in a variety of ways, including:

  • As a moisturizer: Apply sweet almond oil to your skin after bathing or showering.
  • As a massage oil: Massage sweet almond oil into your skin to help relax muscles and reduce tension.
  • As a makeup remover: Apply sweet almond oil to a cotton ball and use it to remove makeup.
  • As a hair treatment: Massage sweet almond oil into your scalp and hair to help nourish and condition it.
  • As a carrier oil for essential oils: Add a few drops of your favorite essential oil to sweet almond oil to create a custom blend for massage or aromatherapy.

entry.title: Sesame Seed Oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nutria Fresh
Type:
Price: 684.00

Sesame seed oil is a flavorful and versatile cooking oil that is made from pressed sesame seeds. It has a nutty, slightly sweet flavor and a light, golden color. Sesame seed oil is a good source of polyunsaturated and monounsaturated fats, as well as vitamin E and antioxidants. 

Quick Facts:

Sesame seed oil has several potential health benefits, including:

  • Improved heart health: Sesame seed oil is a good source of polyunsaturated and monounsaturated fats, which can help to low cholesterol levels and reduce the risk of heart disease.
  • Reduced inflammation: Sesame seed oil has anti-inflammatory properties that can help to reduce inflammation throughout the body. Inflammation is linked to several chronic diseases, such as heart disease, cancer, and Alzheimer's disease.
  • Boosted immune system: Sesame seed oil is a good source of antioxidants, which can help to boost the immune system. Antioxidants can help to protect the body from damage caused by free radicals.
  • Improved skin health: Sesame seed oil is a good source of vitamin E, which is an antioxidant that can help to protect the skin from damage. Sesame seed oil can also help to moisturize the skin and reduce wrinkles.
  • Improved hair health: Sesame seed oil can help to nourish the hair and scalp. It can also help to reduce dandruff and promote hair growth.

How to Use

Sesame seed oil can be used in a variety of ways, including:

  • As a cooking oil: Sesame seed oil can be used to stir-fry, saute, or roast vegetables. It can also be used to make salad dressings or marinades.
  • As a finishing oil: Sesame seed oil can be drizzled over cooked dishes to add flavor and aroma.
  • As a dipping oil: Sesame seed oil can be used as a dipping oil for bread, vegetables, or dumplings.
  • As a massage oil: Sesame seed oil can be used as a massage oil to help relax muscles and reduce tension.
  • As a hair treatment: Sesame seed oil can be massaged into the scalp and hair to help nourish and condition it.

Mustard oil is a pungent, flavorful cooking oil that is made from pressed mustard seeds. It has a deep golden color and a strong, mustardy aroma. Mustard oil is a popular choice for Indian and Bangladeshi cuisine, as well as for pickling and preserving foods. 

Quick Facts:

Mustard oil has several potential health benefits, including:

  • Improved heart health: Mustard oil is a good source of monounsaturated and polyunsaturated fats, which can help to lower cholesterol levels and reduce the risk of heart disease.
  • Reduced inflammation: Mustard oil has anti-inflammatory properties that can help to reduce inflammation throughout the body. Inflammation is linked to several chronic diseases, such as heart disease, cancer, and Alzheimer's disease.
  • Boosted immune system: Mustard oil is a good source of antioxidants, which can help to boost the immune system. Antioxidants can help to protect the body from damage caused by free radicals.
  • Improved digestion: Mustard oil can help to stimulate digestion and promote the absorption of nutrients.
  • Relief from pain and inflammation: Mustard oil can be applied topically to help relieve pain and inflammation. For example, it can be used to massage sore muscles or to help reduce the swelling of a bruise.

How to Use

Mustard oil can be used in a variety of ways, including:

  • As a cooking oil: Mustard oil can be used to stir-fry, saute, or roast vegetables. It can also be used to make salad dressings or marinades.
  • As a finishing oil: Mustard oil can be drizzled over cooked dishes to add flavor and aroma.
  • As a dipping oil: Mustard oil can be used as a dipping oil for bread, vegetables, or dumplings.
  • As a massage oil: Mustard oil can be used as a massage oil to help relax muscles and reduce tension.
  • As a hair treatment: Mustard oil can be massaged into the scalp and hair to help nourish and condition it.

entry.title: Fenugreek Oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nutria Fresh
Type:
Price: 1152.00

Fenugreek oil is a natural oil that is extracted from the seeds of the fenugreek plant. It has a strong, nutty aroma and a slightly bitter taste. Fenugreek oil has been used for centuries in traditional medicine for a variety of ailments. 

Quick Facts:

Fenugreek oil has several potential health benefits, including:

  • Improved hair health: Fenugreek oil is a good source of protein and nicotinic acid, which are both important for hair growth. Fenugreek oil can also help to condition the hair and scalp.
  • Reduced inflammation: Fenugreek oil has anti-inflammatory properties that can help to reduce inflammation throughout the body. Inflammation is linked to several chronic diseases, such as heart disease, cancer, and Alzheimer's disease.
  • Improved blood sugar control: Fenugreek oil can help to improve blood sugar control in people with diabetes. Fenugreek oil can help to slow the absorption of sugar into the bloodstream.
  • Boosted testosterone levels: Fenugreek oil can help to boost testosterone levels in men. Testosterone is a hormone that is important for muscle mass, bone density, and libido.
  • Reduced cholesterol levels: Fenugreek oil can help to reduce cholesterol levels. Fenugreek oil can help to lower LDL (bad) cholesterol and raise HDL (good) cholesterol.

How to Use

Fenugreek oil can be used in a variety of ways. It can be applied topically to the skin or hair, or it can be taken orally.

  • For hair health: Massage fenugreek oil into your scalp and hair. Leave it on for 30 minutes to an hour before washing it off.
  • For inflammation: Apply fenugreek oil to the affected area. Massage it in gently.
  • For blood sugar control: Take 1-2 teaspoons of fenugreek oil per day.
  • For testosterone levels: Take 1-2 teaspoons of fenugreek oil per day.
  • For cholesterol levels: Take 1-2 teaspoons of fenugreek oil per day.

entry.title: Coconut Oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nutria Fresh
Type:
Price: 945.00

Coconut oil is a white, semi-solid fat that is extracted from the meat of mature coconuts. It has a sweet, nutty flavor and a high melting point. Coconut oil is a popular choice for cooking, as it is stable at high temperatures and does not break down easily. It is also a popular choice for skin care and hair care products.

Quick Facts:

Coconut oil has some potential health benefits, including:

  • Improved heart health: Coconut oil is a good source of medium-chain triglycerides (MCTs), which are a type of fat that is metabolized differently than other types of fat. MCTs can help to raise HDL (good) cholesterol levels and lower LDL (bad) cholesterol levels.
  • Reduced inflammation: Coconut oil has anti-inflammatory properties that can help to reduce inflammation throughout the body. Inflammation is linked to some chronic diseases, such as heart disease, cancer, and Alzheimer's disease.
  • Boosted immune system: Coconut oil is a good source of lauric acid, which is a type of fatty acid that has antimicrobial properties. Lauric acid can help to fight off bacteria, viruses, and fungi.
  • Improved brain health: MCTs can help to improve brain function and memory. MCTs are easily absorbed by the brain and can be used for energy.
  • Weight loss: Some studies have shown that coconut oil can help to promote weight loss. MCTs can help to increase metabolism and reduce appetite.

How to Use

Coconut oil can be used in a variety of ways, including:

  • As a cooking oil: Coconut oil can be used to stir-fry, saute, or roast vegetables. It can also be used to make salad dressings or marinades.
  • As a moisturizer: Coconut oil can be used to moisturize the skin and hair. It is a good choice for people with dry skin or hair.
  • As a makeup remover: Coconut oil can be used to remove makeup. It is a gentle and effective way to remove even waterproof mascara.
  • As a hair treatment: Coconut oil can be used to condition the hair. It can help to make hair soft, shiny, and manageable.

As a massage oil: Coconut oil can be used as a massage oil to help relax muscles and reduce tension

entry.summary:
Vendor: Nutria Fresh
Type:

Black seed oil, also known as kalonji oil, is a natural oil that is extracted from the seeds of the black cumin plant (Nigella sativa). It has a strong, pungent aroma and a slightly bitter taste. Black seed oil has been used for centuries in traditional medicine for a variety of ailments. 

Quick Facts:

Black seed oil has several potential health benefits, including:

  • Black seed oil is a good source of antioxidants, which can help to boost the immune system. Antioxidants can help to protect the body from damage caused by free radicals.
  • Black seed oil has anti-inflammatory properties that can help to reduce inflammation throughout the body. Inflammation is linked to several chronic diseases, such as heart disease, cancer, and Alzheimer's disease.
  • Black seed oil can help to improve blood sugar control in people with diabetes. Black seed oil can help to slow the absorption of sugar into the bloodstream.
  • Black seed oil can help to boost testosterone levels in men. Testosterone is a hormone that is important for muscle mass, bone density, and libido.
  • Black seed oil can help to reduce cholesterol levels. Black seed oil can help to lower LDL (bad) cholesterol and raise HDL (good) cholesterol.

How to Use

Black seed oil can be used in a variety of ways, including:

  • Black seed oil can be taken orally by adding it to food or drinks. The recommended dosage is 1-2 teaspoons per day.
  • Black seed oil can be applied topically to the skin. It can be used to treat acne, eczema, and other skin conditions.
  • Black seed oil can be inhaled using a diffuser. This can help to clear congestion and relieve respiratory problems.
